# Konstantinidis-2005

Konstantinidis, K. T., & Tiedje, J. M. (2005). Genomic insights that advance the species definition for prokaryotes. Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America, 102(7), 2567â€“2572.

10.1073/pnas.0409727102


## Files

* `supporting-table-1.csv` - Supporting table 1 (list of genomes used) reformatted from HTML to csv.
* `210910-genomes.csv` - from David, found best NCBI assembly for each genome in supporting table 1.
